description: Qt based cross-platform GUI proxy configuration manager (backend: sing-box)
pre_install: if (Test-Path "$persist_dir\config") { Write-Host -NoNewline "Backing up existing config..." ; Copy-Item -Path "$persist_dir\config" -Destination "$persist_dir\config.bak" -Recurse }
notes: The project maintained by Mahdi-zarei has been renamed to 'Throne'. Try 'scoop install lemon/throne'
